definition: adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: The loan money will be used in the inner decoration.
sentences.chinese: 申请的贷款将用于室内装潢。

sentences.english: The party, Chinese decoration in everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在舞会里，到处都是中国风的装潢。

sentences.english: Here let me say that there is no magnificence about this suite of rooms.
sentences.chinese: 在这儿容许我说一下，房间的装潢绝不富丽堂皇。

sentences.english: We will need to find an interior decorating company to redo the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须找一家室内装潢公司来整修厨房。

sentences.english: Shanghai Dingyi Interior and Exterior Decoration Work Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海鼎艺室内外装潢有限公司。

sentences.english: The fire spread rapidly after the fire dancer ignited the ceiling decoration by accident.
sentences.chinese: 火舞舞者不小心引燃天花板装潢后，大火迅速蔓延。

sentences.english: The accessories in my apartment tend to be on the gren side.
sentences.chinese: 我公寓的装潢也倾向于绿色。

sentences.english: Ocean winds strong winds "is not just companies foreigners ?"
sentences.chinese: 洋风劲吹“难道装潢公司是外国人开的？”

sentences.english: The gorgeous decoration in the palace comes from the hands of skillful craftsmen.
sentences.chinese: 华丽的装潢都是出自能工巧匠之手。

sentences.english: Different colors in book cover were adopted for a good presentation and easy identification.
sentences.chinese: 为了美观和便于识别，《四库全书》采用分色装潢。

sentences.english: We are fascinated by the delicate interior design of the apartment.
sentences.chinese: 公寓的精致的室内装潢设计吸引。

sentences.english: It is widely used in house, hotel and office.
sentences.chinese: 是住宅，宾馆和写字间等的高级装潢材料。

sentences.english: She likes to restore historical fixer-uppers.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢还原复古的装潢。

sentences.english: They've just bought a home and are thinking of decorating it.
sentences.chinese: 他们刚买了一所住宅，而且正在想如何来装潢它。

sentences.english: In the interest of beauty and convenience for recognition, every category of the encyclopedia was decorated in one single color.
sentences.chinese: 为了美观和便于识别，《四库全书》采用分色装潢。

sentences.english: Office buildings and stores are also decorated with red lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 办公楼战商铺也装潢着白灯笼。

definition: variant of 裝潢|装潢[zhuang1 huang2]
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
